alert.note: Alert for Madison (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 02 at 4:46PM CDT until May 02 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Huntsville Alabama has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Madison County in north central Alabama... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 446 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over northwestern Huntsville, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Huntsville, Madison, Moores Mill, Meridianville, Alabama A And M University, University Of Alabama In Huntsville and Harvest. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
